name: ARBITER_ROLE
description: Initiate arbitration of a specific IMA transfer by delaying the transfer for a time defined by the SKALE Chain owner.

name: PAUSABLE_ROLE
description: Pause a specific connected IMA bridge until the SKALE Chain owner resumes the bridge.

name: CONSTANT_SETTER_ROLE
description: Sets new gas limits for MessageProxy outgoing messages (default is 1M gas) and sets CommunityLocker new rate limit for exit messages (default is 5 minutes per exit message).

name: DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE
description: The default admin role is the administrative role of all other roles in the contract and is needed to provide other roles to an address.

name: DEPLOYER_ROLE
description: Deployer Role allows Ethereum Address to deploy smart contracts onto a SKALE Chain when Free Contract Deployment is disabled. Smart Contracts bypass the need for this role.

name: DEPLOYER_ADMIN_ROLE
description: Free Contract Deployment can be enabled or disabled by a user with this role

name: ETHER_MANAGER_ROLE
description: Can retrieve or distribute sFUEL from Etherbase.

name: ALLOCATOR_ROLE
description: On-chain File Storage space can be reserved by a user with this role

name: IMA_ROLE
description: Calls postMessage in Marionette. (WARNING: SHOULD NOT BE REASSIGNED)

name: PUPPETEER_ROLE
description: Call execute, postMessage, and sendEth in Marionette,  Usually assigned to a Multisig. (WARNING: SHOULD NOT BE ASSIGNED)

name: EXTRA_CONTRACT_REGISTRAR_ROLE
description: Add and remove extra SKALE Chain contracts to the IMA Bridge.

name: MTM_ADMIN_ROLE
description: Multi Transaction (MTM) mode can be enabled or disabled by a user with this role

name: REGISTRAR_ROLE
description: Add or remove token manager contracts and connect or remove other SKALE Chains.

name: AUTOMATIC_DEPLOY_ROLE
description: Enable and disable IMA bridge automatic deployment.
